title: Does the Supreme Court split 3-3-3? Pete Williams reviews the Court’s latest term
description: NBC News Justice correspondent Pete Williams looks back at the Supreme Court term to see what we learned about power and alliances on the Court.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
